      • usingDistance

        public static <O extends GeoCoordinateHolder> EmissionProbabilityStrategy<O,Vertex> usingDistance()
        Creates an EmissionProbabilityStrategy based on the distance between the observation point and an OnRoad matched point.

        Use this overload of the method when the geographical coordinate type implements GeoCoordinateHolder.

      • usingDistance

        public static <O> EmissionProbabilityStrategy<O,Vertex> usingDistance(GeoCoordinateAdapter<O> adapter)
        Creates an EmissionProbabilityStrategy based on the distance between the observation point and an OnRoad matched point.

        Parameters:
        adapter - GeoCoordinateAdapter to extract latitude and longitude for O

        Use this overload of the method when the geographical coordinate type does not implement GeoCoordinateHolder.
